sentences.english: There are many great applications of the tensor analysis in survey with the magnetotelluric sounding method.
sentences.chinese: 张量分析在大地电磁测深法勘探中有许多重要的应用。

sentences.english: An application of sounding of induced polarization method in a certain gold deposit, east-southern part of Jilin Province, is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了激电测深法在吉东南某金矿上的应用。

sentences.english: A description of a microprocessor-controlled ultra-sonic depth finder is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介绍了一种用微处理机控制的超声波测深仪。

sentences.english: So was Born the echo-sounding apparatus, now in general use in ships.
sentences.chinese: 这样回声测深仪就诞生了，现已为船只普遍采用。

sentences.english: Jiaojia-pattern gold mines could be surveyed by utilizing large-power induced polarization sounding.
sentences.chinese: 利用大功率的激电测深法可以寻找焦家式深部金矿。

sentences.english: The resistivity sounding data can be obtained on four corners and four surfaces in tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 电阻率测深数据可利用坑道的四个面和四个角得到。

sentences.english: This inference is coincident with deep seismic sounding.
sentences.chinese: 此判断与地震测深的结果一致。

sentences.english: Dual Frequency Echo Sounder(DFES) is a kind of single beam device used for measuring landform of seabed.
sentences.chinese: 双频数字测深仪是一种单波束海底地形测量设备。

sentences.english: You can see the flywheel mechanism and the little sounding wire.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在图片中看到飞轮装置和小测深绳。

sentences.english: Acoustic velocity is an important bathymetric parameter for the multibeam sounding system.
sentences.chinese: 声速是多波束测深系统进行水深测量的重要参数。

sentences.english: The system has been used in an airborne laser depth sounding system in a shallow-water environment.
sentences.chinese: 该系统被用于浅水环境的机载激光测深系统。

sentences.english: In that case, it is difficult to apply the acoustic well-sounding(AWS)method.
sentences.chinese: 这时，使用回声测深法将遇到困难。

sentences.english: The seamen were carrying a strange instrument called a Sounding Instrument.
sentences.chinese: 海员正搬着一个叫做测深仪的奇怪仪器。

sentences.english: The main task of this paper is hardware design of the echosounder.
sentences.chinese: 本文的主要任务是测深仪硬件部分的设计与实现。

definition: level (device to determine horizontal)/spirit level/surveyor's level
to bore a hole/to drill/drilled hole
